dn17:1.3.8: iddhā ceva hoti phītā ca → iddhā ceva ahosi phītā ca (s1-3, km) | iddhā ceva phītā ca (pts1)
dn17:1.8.3: pavatti → pavattati (s1-3, km, mr), anvadeva → anudeva (s1-3, km)
dn17:1.15.2: mānusivaṇṇaṃ → mānusaṃ vaṇṇaṃ (bj, pts1) | mānussīvaṇṇaṃ (s1-3, km)
dn17:1.15.7: aticari → aticārī (bj, s1-3, km, pts1) | aticarī (mr)
dn17:1.33.1: pokkharaṇiyā rājā mahāsudassano ‘ye → ye kho panānanda (s1-3, km, pts1, mr)
dn17:2.12.2: puñchitvā → pamajjitvā (bj, s1-3, km, pts1) | puñjitvā (mr)
dn17:2.13.7: brahmacariyaṃ cari → brahmacariyaṃ ācari (s1-3, km) | brahma­cari­ya­macari (mr), gihibhūto → gihībhūto (bj, pts1) | gīhibhūto (km)
